means: 使欣喜若狂，使着迷，使心醉

sentence.Network_en: He would ravish her and cut her throat at the moment of climax.
sentence.Network_cn: 在高潮的时候,他强奸了她,而后割断她的喉咙.

sentence.Network_en: I know groups of trees that ravish the eye with their perfect, picture like effects.
sentence.Network_cn: 我知道有许多树,由于外表完全象是一幅幅的画儿,叫人看得眼花缭乱.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 强字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 强队〖 powerhouse〗 强夺〖 ravish;wring〗 强风〖 strongbreeze〗.
流刑地 - 博客大巴 ... devastate 摧毁 ravish 蹂躏；强奸；狂喜 deci 与“十”有关.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程(七)|联想记忆法背单词 ... ravage v. 掠夺；破坏 ravish v. 强夺；使狂喜 ray n. 光线.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... relinquish 放弃，废除 ravish 迷住，强夺 peevish 坏脾气的，易怒的.

list.abs: and , first , the party ravished may give evidence upon oath , and is in law competent witness ;首先，被强奸的人可以在宣誓的基础上作证，成为法律上具备作证资格的证人；

he said somber relay would probably last until the torch reached the earthquake ravished areas , with people along relay routes asked to make donations to help quake victims .他认为这样规模的接力可能要持续至火炬抵达地震受灾区域为止，沿途人们将向受灾群众捐赠款项。
The barbarous soldiers ravished the country women ., 野蛮的士兵强奸乡村的妇女.

he said somber relay would probably last until the torch reached the earthquake ravished areas , with people along relay routes asked to make donations to help quake victims .他认为这样规模的接力可能要持续至火炬抵达地震受灾区域为止，沿途人们将向受灾群众捐赠款项。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French raviss-, lengthened stem of ravir, from an alteration of Latin rapere 'seize'

entry.def: If a woman is ravished by a man, she is raped by him.

example.ex: She'll never know how close she came to being dragged off and ravished.
example.tran: 她将永远不知道她差点就被人拖走强暴了。

means.word_mean: 1. force (someone) to have sex against their will;

sentences.sentence: "The woman was raped on her way home at night"

stems_affixes.word_buile: rav捕,夺+age状态→掠夺后的状态
rav捕,夺+en→n.大乌鸦 v.掠夺, 狼吞虎咽
rav捕,夺+en→n.大乌鸦 v.掠夺, 狼吞虎咽

means.word_mean: 使欣喜若狂;使着迷;使心醉

sentences.en: I was utterly ravished by the way she smiled.
sentences.cn: 她的微笑使我完全陶醉了。
